name: Tilted (itch)
description: This was a student project, made by Olegkuv (Oleg's itch.io account), Satan's Cat (Enda Keane), Lostbones (Michael's LinkedIn) and Chionic (chi's github). With sound effects made by Junix (Valentine Ionuts Nache). Background music is open source, individual creators are listed in the in-game credits menu.
